EmailTemplate.name: TSE: KubeCon Barcelona 05_20_19.001 KubeHunt - Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Going to KubeCon? Join KubeHunt, a Barcelona Scavenger Hunt for KubeCon Attendees
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://view.ceros.com/turbonomic/kubehunt/p/1?utm_campaign=kubehunt?utm_keyword=Turbonomic]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Are you going to KubeCon? If so, then join us on Monday, May 20th for an evening scavenger hunt <[[https://view.ceros.com/turbonomic/kubehunt/p/1?utm_campaign=kubehunt?utm_keyword=Turbonomic]]> in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter—the very first KubeHunt!
Register Now <[[https://view.ceros.com/turbonomic/kubehunt/p/1?utm_campaign=kubehunt?utm_keyword=Turbonomic]]>
There are prizes to be won, free T-shirts to be earned, and friends to be made. Following the hunt, there will be a “Smooth Operators” networking reception at the Ocana Club in the Gothic quarter, sponsored by Red Hat, Turbonomic, NetApp, Planetscale, Twistlock, and DataDog.
Don't miss out! Register now. <[[https://view.ceros.com/turbonomic/kubehunt/p/1?utm_campaign=kubehunt?utm_keyword=Turbonomic]]>
Thanks, Asena
